title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Strategies for Using Task-Example Videos in Blended Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic engineering mathematics and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex engineering mathematics problem-solving procedures with 90% accuracy through Worked Example Videos (WEVs).
Learners can improve learning efficiency by 30% by fully utilizing key features of WEV (accessibility, search functionality, etc.) in a mobile environment.
Learners can improve their ability to apply engineering mathematics concepts by 40% using audio explanations and step-by-step learning materials included in WEV.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
